testimonials.name: Joan H
testimonials.quote: We had an Excellent tour as this tour allowed us to see a vast area in a short time. Pilot Freddy and guide, Speedy made our tour very enjoyable. We would highly recommend taking this Majestic Golden Circle tour. Thanks for a great heli tour

testimonials.name: Ramana Murthi
testimonials.quote: The pilot was excellent. He explained all the important scenes and so friendly. He insisted on safety so felt reassures. We were greeted personally by a representative and taken care from start to end

testimonials.name: THeFlyingPelikaan
testimonials.quote: We had a great flight for almost 2 hours. Many thanks to the pilot, who managed to takes us where the sun was shining. We had a great impression of this beautiful country.

testimonials.name: Brenk K
testimonials.quote: We had a phenomenal experience with Glacier Heli Iceland! Their customer service, and knowledge was superior to all other Helicopter Tour Options. I highly recommend this experience for anyone visiting Reykjavik!!

testimonials.name: Haris M
testimonials.quote: From start to finish this was a fantastic trip. Everything was arranged like clockwork on our trip! My family and I loved every second of our trip around the glaciers and seeing the sites around Iceland from the air. I cannot recommend this company enough. I would take another tour in a heart beat. Cheers!

testimonials.name: Roberts Patts
testimonials.quote: One of the best experience ever I highly recommend to visit it is worth it. The German pilot is so humble and professional i liked every minute of the flight
